feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission demonstrates a working financial application—implemented in N8N—that performs concrete mortgage calculations with formatted outputs and multiple examples (e.g., $2,272.18 and $2,809 monthly payments). Discover and Implement evidence show intent and a functioning workflow; Reflect evidence shows iterative improvement, supporting a PASS.
- Integrate AI: The submission demonstrates concrete AI integration (chat model, memory, calculator, structured output) and shows it adds value (formatted financial summaries, budget impact). Implementation examples and the reflection on adding memory indicate the integration is functional and thoughtfully applied rather than superficial.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "So, this is where it spits out the $\$2,272$ and $18$ cents monthly payment on a $\$300,000$ house with $6.7\%$ interest over 20 years."
"the assignment was to build a more advanced AI financial tool using N8N or other platform of your choice."
"Um, so for this one, Financial Summary, category, mortgage. Amount, uh, you can see this one's a little bit more, $\$2,809$, which you would expect on a $\$540,000$ house."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: student states the goal to build an AI financial tool. Implement: student describes the N8N workflow, OpenAI chat model, calculator and shows concrete outputs. Reflect: student comments on improvements (adding memory, calculator) and how the tool changed behavior.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates a working financial application—implemented in N8N—that performs concrete mortgage calculations with formatted outputs and multiple examples (e.g., $2,272.18 and $2,809 monthly payments). Discover and Implement evidence show intent and a functioning workflow; Reflect evidence shows iterative improvement, supporting a PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "Trigger everything into the financial management uh agent. Using chat, using simple memory, using calculator, and that'll all format a response."
"I'll calculate this. It doesn't know my yearly uh loan or anything like that. I'll go ahead and put this one in there."

"I've kind of done a loop one and two all in the same thing to where I've added, um, calculators and memory. I started without the memory and then I added the memory to make it easier for the financial management agent to understand what I'm asking every time that I ask a question."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: student states the assignment goal to build an AI financial tool. Implement: shows workflow components (chat trigger, OpenAI chat model, calculator, memory) and runs example calculations. Reflect: student describes iterative improvement (adding memory) and how AI improved responses.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates concrete AI integration (chat model, memory, calculator, structured output) and shows it adds value (formatted financial summaries, budget impact). Implementation examples and the reflection on adding memory indicate the integration is functional and thoughtfully applied rather than superficial.
